[comment section]
60 FPS (Auto) - line 0
#1 Lines 1-3: 0x0 = gameplay, 0x1 = menu, 0x120 = Blade core opening menu
#2 Lines 4-5: 0x0 = gameplay, 0x1 = cutscene
#3 Line 6: XOR #1, #2
Line 7: IF (#3 == 0) pass all next instructions while any of next lines is not 20000000, ELSE jump to line 45
Line 45: IF (#3 !=0) pass all next instructions while any of next lines is not 20000000, ELSE jump to line 86
To do: check for blade core opening cutscenes pointer
GOAL:
- gameplay = 60 FPS 360p fixed, TMAA disabled
- Blade core opening menu, game menu = 60 FPS Docked mode settings
- cutscene, Blade core opening cutscenes, main menu = 30 FPS Docked mode settings
